overview: Welcome to The Factory, where bad girls go to learn how to become good, honest, wives. A nightmare for the girls living there, the staff who run The Factory are rigid and unforgiving. Late one night, beautiful Emily Willis sneaks down the hallway to ditsy Mary Moody’s room. Dark-haired Emily knows that big-breasted Mary often sleeps without her lacey nightie on, and Emily is craving the taste of Mary’s sweet kiss and soft touch. These gorgeous girls had better hurry – at night, Miss. Vandella roams the halls just waiting to punish bad, misbehaving girls!
tagline: Where Bad Girls go to learn how to become good wives.
title: The Factory
